title: "Back to the Second Future" correctly predicted by the World World Series of the World Taxi in 2015?
subtitle: The 1989 film "Back to the Second Future" did not correctly predict that Chicago would be the winner of the 2015 World Champions of Marilyns.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The next second film in 1987 correctly predicted that the Florida Marlene would win the World Championship in 1997 and that the Cobbs team would play Florida in the 2015 World Series.
